item.title: CV

item.title: Research
item.description: Research Interests My research interests are currently focused on comparative political behavior & institutions, quantitative methods, and formal theory. My research specifically looks at ways in which institutional arrangements (e.g. voting systems, system of government, etc.) influence voters views on economic conditions and the clarity of responsibility of economic conditions. MA Thesis My MA thesis looks at which voters follow HTV cards in Australia; it can be found at this link.
